About


I am Bruno, I help other historians and social scientists to learn data science. Moreover, I am legislative advisor at the Federal Senate of Brazil, interested in data science and data-driven policies. I hold a master's degree in Public Policy from the Hertie School and a Bachelor's in History from the University of Brasília.


This website unites two of the things I am passionate about: data science and history. Please do not hesitate to contact me. Feedback and suggestions are welcome! 😊
